Title: Enacts "the COVID-19 extra time for heroes act"
Summary: Enacts "the COVID-19 extra time for heroes act" providing an additional five days of personal time to public employees who worked as a certified first responder and a healthcare worker and had contact with infected patients during the COVID-19 pandemic.
LawCode: Add ยง159-c, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to enacting "the COVID-19 extra time for heroes act"
